column5: Hey just wondering if anyone has been to golden eagle camp in matchawan Ontario. Thanks guys
was there a few years ago in september the owners were nice people.we stayed in the newer 2 floor cottage it was very nice .the fishing was slow we did manage to catch a few walleye.
It was a few years ago, but yes, I've been there... HH
When I started to moose hunt with a group,we stayed there. The owner at the time use to work with the fellas at Labbatts. Great area for fishing and hunting.

I have not been there in years but the place was nice and lots of fish to catch. We always caught walleye sm bass and pike lots to go around. During the may 24 weekend you can catch eyes from the docks or across the bay in the current.
Yup.. its about 8k from my camp.  Owners are great, and the river fishing on thier end is good as well.. theres also a ton of back lakes they have boats on.
